actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to restore the survivor annuities of certain remarried spouses whose remarriages have terminated, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Restores the survivorship civil service retirement annuities of remarried spouses of Federal employees and officials whose remarriages have terminated.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to restore the survivor annuities of certain remarried spouses whose remarriages have terminated, and for other purposes.
